title: Revert book cover photos to original versions

requirements.text: Restore the original book cover static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated/ by reverting book-cover-01.jpeg, book-cover-02.jpeg, book-cover-03.jpeg, and book-cover-04.jpeg to the versions that existed before Version 25 replaced them. The correct originals are the user-uploaded BOOK (1).jpeg through BOOK (4).jpeg files: book-cover-01.jpeg = गंगा की वाणी, book-cover-02.jpeg = मन के मोती, book-cover-03.jpeg = श्री कृष्ण दर्शन, book-cover-04.jpeg = वृद्धाश्रम. Do not alter the image content — only restore the original uploaded files.

quotes: GIVE THE ORIGINAL BOOK COVERS DONT CHANGE THE COVER PHOTOS

acceptanceCriteria: book-cover-01.jpeg in frontend/public/assets/generated/ matches the original BOOK (1).jpeg (गंगा की वाणी) uploaded by the user
book-cover-02.jpeg in frontend/public/assets/generated/ matches the original BOOK (2).jpeg (मन के मोती) uploaded by the user
book-cover-03.jpeg in frontend/public/assets/generated/ matches the original BOOK (3).jpeg (श्री कृष्ण दर्शन) uploaded by the user
book-cover-04.jpeg in frontend/public/assets/generated/ matches the original BOOK (4).jpeg (वृद्धाश्रम) uploaded by the user
The 'Books by Our Founder' section on Home page and About page display the correct original cover images without any AI-generated replacements
No other files or UI code are modified

constraints: Do not alter any book titles or labels in Home.tsx or About.tsx
Do not modify any other static assets or page content
Only the image file content of book-cover-01.jpeg through book-cover-04.jpeg should be restored — no code changes required
nonGoals: Changing book titles or labels on Home or About pages
Adding new book covers or removing existing ones
Modifying any other gallery or page content
